casebody.data:
Joseph C. GARCIA, petitioner,
v.
Lorie DAVIS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 18-6898 (18A579). Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 4, 2018.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
